title: PF2e Complete Crafting Overhaul
description: A compendium module for my homebrew crafting system overhaul, including feats and actions to replace the base game versions.

bonus-craft.label: Bonus Craft
bonus-craft.description: Feats with this trait allow a character to create an additional item (or batch of items) whenever they spend a Downtime Phase to Craft. Some of these feats allow characters to also Craft extra items during Daily Preparations if they can provide the adequate reagents. A character may only benefit from one Bonus Crafting feat during a single Downtime Phase or Daily Preparation, unless the feat states otherwise.

master-crafting.label: Master Crafting
master-crafting.description: Feats with this trait represent the character's particular niche and their area of expertise. A character may only have one Master Crafting feat at a time, unless otherwise specified.

reagent.label: Reagent
reagent.description: Items with this trait are a reagent of some description; perhaps it comes from a mine and is potent orichalcum, or it is the trachea of a red dragon. Either way, reagents have an elemental trait, a gp value, and can be used in the crafting process to substitute for a character's gold.
